summary.title: Punchy Whale
summary.about: This is the challenge you have been searching for.  Will you be able to find the prize?

chapters.title: Humble Beginnings
chapters.prose: Little Johnny thought he at the start of yet another humdrum day at the Bartlet academy for average children.  Little did he know that his day was about to be wrecked by a careless reader.

signpost.teaser: Make Johnny skip school and go to the arcade.

chapters.title: Johnny Goes to School.
chapters.prose: Yup, this is definitely going to be one of those normal, ordinary days.

summary.title: Bring Home the Bacon
summary.about: Your family is starving, literally.  You need to do something fast, but you also need to survive.
